title: UK Question Time holds govt. accountable

content.question: The primary purpose of the Question Hour in the British Parliament is to

choices.label: recall legislators who have lost the respect of the people
hold government ministers accountable for their actions
give interest groups the opportunity to appeal directly for public support
permit the Prime Minister to respond directly to queries from the general public

content.answer: hold government ministers accountable for their actions

topic.text: 2.2: Comparing Parliamentary, Presidential, and Semi-Presidential Systems
